name: Survival2D
description:
Second project developed at the university. A simple survival in 2D with a primitive item store. It was made with Unipro-unity and using royalty free  assets.

Objective: Defend the Sun Shrine  during the largest amount of time possible.

Project developed with Enrique Cortina Escudero. This is a practice not a finish commercial game, therefore expect some issues.

A - Move LeftD - Move RightS - Go down PlatformTab - Change weapon (if possible)L - Attack 

Space - JumpX - Purchase an item
(100 gold each - must be over icon)

Alt + F4 to exit
